description: Adds a text value to a map.

input.name: map
input.description:
A map to which the value will be added.
If unspecified, the value will be added to a new map.

input.name: key
input.description: The key to be added to the map.

input.name: value
input.description: The value to be added to the map.

input.name: overwrite
input.description:
Whether to overwrite the value if the specified key already exists in the map.
Defaults to True`.

output.name: map
output.description: A map containing the added value.
